this formidable censor of the public at the tribunal of public opinion , produces reform peaceably , which must otherwise be done by revolution .强大的大众监督功能，与公众舆论仲裁结合，产生和平的变革。否则变革只能由革命达成。
for most of Year One of this insanely elongated process the Democratic Party had been a peaceable kingdom .在这个被疯狂拉长的选举过程的大部分时间里，民主党就似一个平静的王国。
